comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I'm guessing the "L" is a mis-transcribed "Z", as this appears to be this fellow: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zygmunt_Stojowski

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: That looks like him. Though he seems to have been known as Sigismond Stojowski at the time, and mostly so thereafter as well. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0C11FC3A581273... A detailed online biographical sketch: www.usc.edu/dept/polish_music/PMJ/issue/5.2.02/herterstoj...
